sentences.cn: 遗嘱可以通过明示推翻.

sentences.en: Agency may be created expressly by deed, writing or oral appointment.
sentences.cn: 代理的产生可以是根据契约, 书面或口头协定等明示方式.

sentences.en: Bleasdale had written the role expressly for Robert Lindsay.
sentences.cn: 布利斯戴尔专门为罗伯特·林赛写了这个角色。

sentences.en: He has expressly forbidden her to go out on her own.
sentences.cn: 他已经明确禁止她独自外出。

sentences.en: He was expressly forbidden to speak to the girl.
sentences.cn: 他被明确禁止与那个女孩说话。

sentences.en: I told you expressly to report to me everyday.
sentences.cn: 我明确告诉过你每天要向我汇报.

sentences.en: Petroleum and natural gas are expressly excluded. )
sentences.cn: 石油和天然气被专门排除在外. )

sentences.en: She expressly conditioned for paying no visits to others.
sentences.cn: 她明确地提出了条件:不得上别的人家作客.

sentences.en: She had given it expressly on one side.
sentences.cn: 但是她在旁边却看得清清楚楚.

sentences.en: She partakes of dishes which I make expressly for her.
sentences.cn: 她享受着我专门为她制作的菜肴.

sentences.en: She was expressly forbidden to touch my papers.
sentences.cn: 已经明确禁止她动我的文件。

sentences.en: The building is expressly designed to conserve energy.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑经特别设计以节约能源。

sentences.en: These conditions must be expressly incorporated into the contract of employment.
sentences.cn: 这些条件都必须明确地写进雇佣合同之中.

sentences.en: This ship was designed expressly for exploring the Arctic waters.
sentences.cn: 这艘船是为考察北极水域而特意设计的.

sentences.en: Those are expressly designed to illustrate the vagaries of Leibnizian notation.
sentences.cn: 那些是用来说明莱布尼兹记号的巧妙想法.

sentences.en: We came here expressly to see the sunrise.
sentences.cn: 我们到这里来就是为了看日出.

sentences.en: You were expressly told not to touch my papers.
sentences.cn: 已经明确地告诉过你不要动我的文件.

words.tran_cn: 快车，快递，专使；捷运公司

trans.tran_cn: 明显地，明确地，特别地，特意地
trans.tran_en: if you say something expressly, you say it very clearly and firmly
